name: Healthier Basic Crepes
author: MakeItHealthy
summary: I love this recipe because it is so simple to make. I have made it healthier by substituting whole wheat flour and 1% milk. I like to fill them with non-fat plain Greek yogurt and blueberries warmed in maple syrup. Yum!
ingredients: ½ cup non-fat plain Greek yogurt
directions: Whisk together flour and eggs in a large mixing bowl
Gradually add milk and water, stirring to combine
Mix in butter and salt and beat until smooth
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat
Pour or scoop 1/4 cup batter onto griddle
Tilt pan with a circular motion so batter coats the surface evenly
Cook crepe until bottom is light brown, about 2 minutes
Loosen with a spatula, turn and cook other side
Serve hot with yogurt, maple syrup, and blueberries
